headline.main: U.S. PRODS SOVIET ON FREE WORSHIP; Roosevelt Discloses Steps -- Pope's Aid in Winning Italy to Peace Reported Sought U.S. PRODS SOVIET ON FREE WORSHIP

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 3 -- President Roosevelt revealed today that he had instructed W. Averell Harriman, head of the United States delegation to the Moscow tripartite conference, to take up with the Stalin government the question of religious freedom in the Soviet Union.
abstract: Roosevelt discloses instructions to Harriman to discuss religious issue with USSR

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
